Articles.Content: Ok so i installed Infernal Robotics a few days ago just to add that bit more to probs and relays moving the dish ect. I seem to of ran into a problem though when ever i put some parts together and run a quick test to see how it looks all the parts twist and in some cases it brakes other parts of structure. So i am just wonderin if this is a mod problem or if i am just putting wrong parts together. I am running version 1.2.1
